entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
